meanings.sent1: Proteinases help to digest proteins in our stomach.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study proteinases to understand how they work in the body.
meanings.sent3: The proteinases at the party were breaking down the snacks at an alarming rate!
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit acted like proteinases, breaking down the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The proteinases in our body are like tiny scissors cutting up protein strands.

meanings.definition: Proteins that break down other proteins.
meanings.sent1: Some proteinases can target specific proteins for breakdown.
meanings.sent2: The body produces proteinases to regulate protein levels.
meanings.sent3: The proteinases in the gym were challenging each other to a protein-breaking contest.
meanings.sent4: His words were like proteinases, breaking down her defenses effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: In the world of proteins, proteinases are the ultimate recyclers, breaking down old proteins for new use.
